----------

Application last refreshed:

```{r}
alr <- file.info("../success.txt")$mtime
appLastRefreshed <- paste0(
    format(alr, "%B"), " ",
    as.integer(format(alr, "%d")), ", ",
    format(alr, "%Y"), " @ ",
    trimws(format(alr, "%l:%M:%S %p"))
)
rm(alr)
```

<p id="lastRefreshDate">`r appLastRefreshed`</p>
